AddonSuggestionsRequest.description: Request for computing addon suggestions separately from optimization.
AddonSuggestionsRequest.title: AddonSuggestionsRequest

AddonSuggestionsResponse.description: Response for the addon suggestions endpoint.
AddonSuggestionsResponse.title: AddonSuggestionsResponse

is_admin.description: True when the user has admin privileges
is_admin.title: Is Admin

registered.description: Whether the current user has credentials set
registered.title: Registered

username.description: Username if the user registered, otherwise null
username.title: Username

enabled.description: True when Telegram integration is configured
enabled.title: Enabled

link_token.description: Pending link token for manual entry
link_token.title: Link Token

link_token_expires_at.description: Expiry timestamp for the pending link token
link_token_expires_at.title: Link Token Expires At

link_url.description: Deep link URL to open the bot with the pending token
link_url.title: Link Url

linked_at.description: Timestamp when Telegram chat was linked
linked_at.title: Linked At

parameters.description: Search by biomarker name or ELAB code
parameters.name: query

schema.description: Search by biomarker name or ELAB code
schema.title: Query

post.description:
Compute addon suggestions for a given optimization solution.

This endpoint is called after /optimize to lazily load addon suggestions,
improving the initial response time of the optimization endpoint.
